/**
 * \page page_eds EDS Example
 *
 * Implements an example program that extract or writes EDS Data from or to a DAT File.
 * 
 * Remember to run this example on windows the streaming lib dll must be in yout path.
 * 
 * \par Location
 * \code
 *    ./examples/eds/
 * \endcode
 *
 * \par This example shows:
 * \li how to extract EDS Data from a DAT File to a directory.
 * \li how to write EDS Data to a DAT File.
 * \li how to check if the EDS Data exists in the DAT File.
 * 
 * \par The Implementation for the EDS Example
 * \include eds.cpp
 *
 */
